idea:
Digital Media for brands has gone beyond just connecting  with the consumer. Digital Marketing nowadays is about tangible and intangible results which drive almost any business. Be it improving user experience, building a community, driving real-time consumer engagement, getting sales or building your brand! That's where we come into the picture! Future X Media is a Result Driven Digital Marketing Agency that strives to go beyond 'conventional digital media metrics' to get you those real business results. We solve problems by building innovative solutions that entice our customer at the same time have a measurable impact on our clients’ business goals. We try to not just Think, but also 'Act Different' and work with our clients in tandem to achieve their marketing goals. Our team comprises of young, smart & innovative thinkers. Work, for us, is more than just doing our job and going home, it’s about creating an impact.

As a start-up led by one of the youngest & experienced entrepreneurs in India, we are dedicated, clear, concise and a 100% transparent! We guarantee the lowest price in the industry without sacrificing the quality of work. We provide flexible services (no fixed packages) that best suit your business goals. All our work is done in-house and not outsourced to a third party. Some of the craziest and innovative campaigns are created every day at Future X Media. You’ll see positive ROI within the first three months which will only get better with more time! A high client retention rate proves that we give consistent results.
name: FUTUREX MEDIA & COMMUNICATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: iGenetic Diagnostics is a full service pathology company that conducts hard to perform tests, especially in the areas of critical care, oncology and infertility. We have the full range of investigations - including specialized molecular and cytogenetic investigations, as well as all the routine investigations needed for common ailments. Our test menu is over 1400 investigations
name: IGENETIC DIAGNOSTICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
M/s Applied Optical Technologies, Mumbai is an ISO Certified manufacturing Company. We are in Business of Fiber Optics for more than 15 years and expertise in manufacture of Fiber Optics based product for Medical, Industrial & Research Applications.

Our Products are of High Quality & are our Optic Fiber Cables are CE certificated meeting international quality standard. Our products are exported to various countries in Europe, Asia, South America,
In addition to it's wide acceptance in local market too.

Our product are used by Hospitals, Primary Health Care center and Medical Center during all major Surgery like Laproscopy, Endoscopy, open surgery and for disgnosis in OPD, etc. We understand there is great demand for these products in all Govt. Medical Institues.
Being of unique technology, mainly import dependent product and as the products are available in India at very competitive price, the benefit should go to local govt. institutions too.

Our major products are:-
1.) Optic Fiber Cables (Autoclave) For all Medical Applications.
2.) LED Light Sources
3.) Laser Deliver Cables -Silica & Silicate Cables /Probes/Fiber Patch Cords.
4.) LED Headlights
5.) LED Examination Lights
6.) Fiber Optic Carrier Pipes.
name: APPLIED OPTICAL TECHNOLOGIES PVT LTD

idea: SHVH TRADING PVT LTD. has been incorporated with a vision of introducing products for consumer use on a large scale. Our products are mainly problem-solving and convenience of the consumers.

idea:
PowersWithin Self-Development Academy has designed and conducts ‘BecomingSaksham’- the training program with the objective:
1) To make indiividuals become aware and realise the ‘PowersWithin’ themselves
2) Helping them improve their Happiness levels.
3) To develop their coping mechanisms to deal with the challenges of today’s world and move towards freedom from pain, misery and worry.

‘BecomingSaksham’ Trainings specially designed for the  of children category and conducting it since more than 3 year. More than 150 children have benefited from it. With the aim to transform Children into Worry free, Happy, Confident and Successful ones.
name: POWERSWITHIN SELF-DEVELOPMENT ACADEMY (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED
